speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: What, John! What, Robert!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Quickly, quickly! Is the buck-basket—

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: I warrant.—What, Robert, I say!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Come, come, come.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Here, set it down.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Give your men the charge. We must be

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: brief.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Marry, as I told you before, John and

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Robert, be ready here hard by in the brewhouse,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: and when I suddenly call you, come forth, and

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: without any pause or staggering take this basket

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: on your shoulders. That done, trudge with it in all

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: haste, and carry it among the whitsters in Datchet

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Mead, and there empty it in the muddy ditch close

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: by the Thames side.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: You will do it?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: I ha’ told them over and over. They lack

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: no direction.—Be gone, and come when you are

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: called.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Here comes little Robin.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: How now, my eyas-musket? What news

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: with you?

speaker: ROBIN
text: My master, Sir John, is come in at your back

speaker: ROBIN
text: door, Mistress Ford, and requests your company.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: You little Jack-a-Lent, have you been

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: true to us?

speaker: ROBIN
text: Ay, I’ll be sworn. My master knows not of your

speaker: ROBIN
text: being here and hath threatened to put me into

speaker: ROBIN
text: everlasting liberty if I tell you of it, for he swears

speaker: ROBIN
text: he’ll turn me away.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Thou ’rt a good boy. This secrecy of

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: thine shall be a tailor to thee and shall make thee a

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: new doublet and hose.—I’ll go hide me.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Do so.—Go tell thy master I am alone.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text:
(
                Robin
                 
                exits
                .
                )
               Mistress Page, remember you your

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: cue.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: I warrant thee. If I do not act it, hiss

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: me.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Go to, then. We’ll use this unwholesome

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: humidity, this gross-wat’ry pumpion. We’ll

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: teach him to know turtles from jays.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: “Have I caught thee, my heavenly jewel?”

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Why, now let me die, for I have lived long enough.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: This is the period of my ambition. O, this blessèd

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: hour!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: O, sweet Sir John!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Mistress Ford, I cannot cog. I cannot prate,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Mistress Ford. Now shall I sin in my wish: I would

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: thy husband were dead. I’ll speak it before the best

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: lord: I would make thee my lady.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: I your lady, Sir John? Alas, I should be

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: a pitiful lady.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Let the court of France show me such

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: another. I see how thine eye would emulate the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: diamond. Thou hast the right arched beauty of the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: brow that becomes the ship-tire, the tire-valiant,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: or any tire of Venetian admittance.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: A plain kerchief, Sir John. My brows

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: become nothing else, nor that well neither.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Thou art a tyrant to say so. Thou wouldst

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: make an absolute courtier, and the firm fixture of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: thy foot would give an excellent motion to thy gait

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: in a semicircled farthingale. I see what thou wert,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: if Fortune thy foe were not, Nature thy friend.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Come, thou canst not hide it.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Believe me, there’s no such thing in

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: me.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: What made me love thee? Let that persuade

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: thee. There’s something extraordinary in thee.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Come, I cannot cog and say thou art this and that

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: like a many of these lisping hawthorn buds that

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: come like women in men’s apparel and smell like

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Bucklersbury in simple time. I cannot. But I love

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: thee, none but thee; and thou deserv’st it.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Do not betray me, sir. I fear you love

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Mistress Page.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Thou mightst as well say I love to walk by

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: the Counter gate, which is as hateful to me as the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: reek of a lime-kiln.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Well, heaven knows how I love you,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: and you shall one day find it.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Keep in that mind. I’ll deserve it.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Nay, I must tell you, so you do, or else

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: I could not be in that mind.

speaker: ROBIN
text: Mistress Ford, Mistress Ford! Here’s Mistress

speaker: ROBIN
text: Page at the door, sweating and blowing and looking

speaker: ROBIN
text: wildly, and would needs speak with you

speaker: ROBIN
text: presently.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: She shall not see me. I will ensconce me behind

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: the arras.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Pray you, do so. She’s a very tattling

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: woman.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: What’s the matter? How now?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: O Mistress Ford, what have you done?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: You’re shamed, you’re overthrown, you’re undone

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: forever!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: What’s the matter, good Mistress Page?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: O well-a-day, Mistress Ford, having an

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: honest man to your husband, to give him such

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: cause of suspicion!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: What cause of suspicion?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: What cause of suspicion? Out upon you!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: How am I mistook in you!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Why, alas, what’s the matter?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Your husband’s coming hither, woman,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: with all the officers in Windsor, to search for a gentleman

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: that he says is here now in the house, by

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: your consent, to take an ill advantage of his absence.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: You are undone.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: ’Tis not so, I hope.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Pray heaven it be not so, that you have

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: such a man here! But ’tis most certain your husband’s

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: coming, with half Windsor at his heels, to

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: search for such a one. I come before to tell you. If

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: you know yourself clear, why, I am glad of it. But if

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: you have a friend here, convey, convey him out. Be

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: not amazed! Call all your senses to you; defend

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: your reputation, or bid farewell to your good life

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: forever.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: What shall I do? There is a gentleman,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: my dear friend; and I fear not mine own shame so

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: much as his peril. I had rather than a thousand

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: pound he were out of the house.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: For shame! Never stand “you had

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: rather” and “you had rather.” Your husband’s here

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: at hand. Bethink you of some conveyance. In the

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: house you cannot hide him. O, how have you deceived

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: me! Look, here is a basket. If he be of any

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: reasonable stature, he may creep in here; and

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: throw foul linen upon him, as if it were going to

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: bucking. Or—it is whiting time—send him by your

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: two men to Datchet Mead.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: He’s too big to go in there. What shall I

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: do?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Let me see ’t, let me see ’t! O, let me see ’t! I’ll

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: in, I’ll in. Follow your friend’s counsel. I’ll in.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: What, Sir John Falstaff?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Are these your letters, knight?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I love thee. Help me

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: away. Let me creep in here. I’ll never—

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Help to cover your master,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: boy.—Call your men, Mistress Ford.—You dissembling

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: knight!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: What, John! Robert! John!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Go, take up these clothes here quickly. Where’s the

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: cowlstaff? Look how you drumble! Carry them to

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: the laundress in Datchet Mead. Quickly! Come.

speaker: FORD
text: Pray you, come near. If I suspect without cause,

speaker: FORD
text: why then make sport at me. Then let me be your

speaker: FORD
text: jest; I deserve it.—How now? Whither bear you

speaker: FORD
text: this?

speaker:
ROBERT
               
              and
               
              JOHN
text: To the laundress, forsooth.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Why, what have you to do whither they

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: bear it? You were best meddle with buck-washing!

speaker: FORD
text: Buck? I would I could wash myself of the buck.

speaker: FORD
text: Buck, buck, buck! Ay, buck! I warrant you, buck,

speaker: FORD
text: and of the season too, it shall appear.

speaker: FORD
text: Gentlemen, I have dreamed tonight; I’ll tell you my

speaker: FORD
text: dream. Here, here, here be my keys. Ascend my

speaker: FORD
text: chambers. Search, seek, find out. I’ll warrant we’ll

speaker: FORD
text: unkennel the fox. Let me stop this way first.

speaker: FORD
text: So, now uncape.

speaker: PAGE
text: Good Master Ford, be contented. You wrong

speaker: PAGE
text: yourself too much.

speaker: FORD
text: True, Master Page.—Up, gentlemen. You shall

speaker: FORD
text: see sport anon. Follow me, gentlemen.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: This is fery fantastical humors and

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: jealousies.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: By gar, ’tis no the fashion of France. It is

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: not jealous in France.

speaker: PAGE
text: Nay, follow him, gentlemen. See the issue of his

speaker: PAGE
text: search.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Is there not a double excellency in this?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: I know not which pleases me better—

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: that my husband is deceived, or Sir John.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: What a taking was he in when your

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: husband asked who was in the basket!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: I am half afraid he will have need of

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: washing, so throwing him into the water will do

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: him a benefit.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Hang him, dishonest rascal! I would all

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: of the same strain were in the same distress.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: I think my husband hath some special

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: suspicion of Falstaff’s being here, for I never saw

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: him so gross in his jealousy till now.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: I will lay a plot to try that, and we will

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: yet have more tricks with Falstaff. His dissolute

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: disease will scarce obey this medicine.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Shall we send that foolish carrion Mistress

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Quickly to him, and excuse his throwing into

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: the water, and give him another hope, to betray

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: him to another punishment?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: We will do it. Let him be sent for tomorrow

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: eight o’clock to have amends.

speaker: FORD
text: I cannot find him. Maybe the knave bragged of

speaker: FORD
text: that he could not compass.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Heard you

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: that?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: You use me well, Master Ford, do you?

speaker: FORD
text: Ay, I do so.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: Heaven make you better than your

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              FORD
text: thoughts!

speaker: FORD
text: Amen!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: You do yourself mighty wrong, Master

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              PAGE
text: Ford.

speaker: FORD
text: Ay, ay. I must bear it.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: If there be anypody in the house, and in the

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: chambers, and in the coffers, and in the presses,

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: heaven forgive my sins at the day of judgment!

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Be gar, nor I too. There is nobodies.

speaker: PAGE
text: Fie, fie, Master Ford, are you not ashamed?

speaker: PAGE
text: What spirit, what devil suggests this imagination?

speaker: PAGE
text: I would not ha’ your distemper in this kind for the

speaker: PAGE
text: wealth of Windsor Castle.

speaker: FORD
text: ’Tis my fault, Master Page. I suffer for it.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: You suffer for a pad conscience. Your wife is

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: as honest a ’omans as I will desires among five

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: thousand, and five hundred too.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: By gar, I see ’tis an honest woman.

speaker: FORD
text: Well, I promised you a dinner. Come, come,

speaker: FORD
text: walk in the park. I pray you, pardon me. I will

speaker: FORD
text: hereafter make known to you why I have done

speaker: FORD
text: this.—Come, wife—come, Mistress Page, I pray

speaker: FORD
text: you, pardon me. Pray, heartily, pardon me.

speaker: PAGE
text: Let’s go in, gentlemen.

speaker: PAGE
text: But, trust me, we’ll mock him.

speaker: PAGE
text: I do invite you tomorrow morning

speaker: PAGE
text: to my house to breakfast. After, we’ll a-birding together;

speaker: PAGE
text: I have a fine hawk for the bush. Shall it be

speaker: PAGE
text: so?

speaker: FORD
text: Anything.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: If there is one, I shall make two in the

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: company.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: If there be one or two, I shall make-a the

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: turd.

speaker: FORD
text: Pray you, go, Master Page.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: I pray you now, remembrance tomorrow on

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: the lousy knave mine Host.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Dat is good, by gar, with all my heart.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: A lousy knave, to have his gibes and his

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: mockeries!
